title: CS 544 vs CS 320 vs CS 540
body: Which one is the most beneficial? What does the course load look like for these classes?
comments: If no you have no python experience take cs320 before CS 540 or CS 544. Between CS 540(data scientist,ML/AI engineer) and CS 544(data engineer, software engineer), depends what you want to do as your job. CS 544 is also relevant for data scientist,ML/AI engineer but take CS 540 first.
